title: Upstairs-Vaulted Ceilings, Renovated, Stainless Steel Appliances
posting_body: ['The Met', '2701 North Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV, 89108', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 57', 'OR Text', '57', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'WELCOME TO THE MET', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1211 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Experience a beautiful apartment community with relaxed living in the northwest side of Las Vegas, Nevada.', 'Experience spacious apartments that are minutes from the Las Vegas Strip, surrounded by accessible transportation links, dining, entertainment, and shopping.', 'Our prime location and on-site amenities will offer you the very best living, whether you are barbecuing with your neighbors or taking a cool dip in our swimming pool.', 'Get in touch with The Met apartments today to schedule an appointment and tour.', 'We look forward to meeting you!', 'Features', '- Air Conditioning', '- Private Balcony/Patio', '- Energy Efficient Appliances', '- Walk-in Closets', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', '- Upgraded Flooring*', '- Courtyard', '- Custom Cabinetry', '- Fireplaces*', '- Granite Counters*', 'Community Amenities', '- Garages Available', '- Close Proximity to Parks', '- Close proximity to Wing & Lilly Fong Elementary, Irwin and Susan Molasky JHS and Cimarron-Memorial High School', '- Online Rental Payments', '- Fitness Center', '- Located by Highway 95, public transportation, Walmart Super Center, and Best of The West Shopping Center', '- Pet Friendly*', '- Playground', '- Pool View', '- WiFi available in the club house', '- 4 Swimming Pools and 3 Spas', '- Gated Electronic Entrance', '- Theater Room', '- Major employers in the area such as MountainView Hospital and the NW Las Vegas Medical District', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday:11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Mb5mZ0m0']
